title: Pumpkin, Leek and Sweet Potato Soup
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 leeks, chopped', '1 small white onion, chopped', '1 stick celery, chopped', '1 small carrot, chopped', '2 sweet potatoes, peeled and diced', '1 medium sugar pumpkin, seeded and cubed', '2 tablespoons chopped garlic', '1 litre chicken stock', '250ml whipping cream', '1 bay leaf', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh sage', '1 pinch ground cloves', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 pinch ground cinnamon', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste']
